oak_starter_introduction.1: - You see the familiar face of Professor Oak, red with exertion, sprinting to stop you before you enter the tall grass
oak_starter_introduction.2: There are dangerous pokemon and trainers in the grass. You are far too young to be out there without protection.
oak_starter_introduction.3: Come back with me to my lab... I have something to show you
oak_starter_introduction.4: - Oak takes you away from Route 1, back towards his lab.
oak_starter_introduction.5:
- When you enter the lab, everything is buzzing with energy. (literally and figuritavely) 
Scientists are running around with various books and research papers.
oak_starter_introduction.7: - Professor Oak and his grandson are standing at a table with 3 Pokeballs on it
oak_starter_introduction.8: - You walk over to the table to talk with Professor Oak as he brings his grandson in for a hug
oak_starter_introduction.9: You boys inspire me. I was once a young kid like you
